goal (1 subgoal):
 1. edom (\<A>\<^sup>\<bottom>\<^bsub>a\<^esub> e) \<subseteq> fv e
lemma Aexp_fresh_bot[simp]: assumes "atom v \<sharp> e" shows "\<A>\<^bsub>a\<^esub> e v = \<bottom>"

proof (chain)
picking this:
  atom v \<sharp> e

proof (prove)
using this:
  atom v \<sharp> e

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. v \<notin> fv e

proof (state)
this:
  v \<notin> fv e

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<A>\<^bsub>a\<^esub> e v = \<bottom>

proof (chain)
picking this:
  edom (\<A>\<^bsub>?a\<^esub> ?e) \<subseteq> fv ?e
  v \<notin> fv e

proof (prove)
using this:
  edom (\<A>\<^bsub>?a\<^esub> ?e) \<subseteq> fv ?e
  v \<notin> fv e

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. v \<notin> edom (\<A>\<^bsub>a\<^esub> e)

proof (state)
this:
  v \<notin> edom (\<A>\<^bsub>a\<^esub> e)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<A>\<^bsub>a\<^esub> e v = \<bottom>

proof (prove)
using this:
  v \<notin> edom (\<A>\<^bsub>a\<^esub> e)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<A>\<^bsub>a\<^esub> e v = \<bottom>

proof (state)
this:
  \<A>\<^bsub>a\<^esub> e v = \<bottom>

goal:
No subgoals!
